EmailTemplate.name: YETI Rambler Customization - Rambler On
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
For customized Rambler products, visit the YETI Custom Shop. This is our official customization service for the Rambler line and it's the only process that's guaranteed to be Built For The Wild.
Whether it's your favorite college team's logo, custom monogram or text, or a design that's all your own, the YETI Custom Shop will create a permanent finish on your Rambler using a premium, ultra-durable marking process.
Get started now at yeticustomshop.com or get in touch by emailing them hi@yeticustomshop.com or calling 512.777.1078.
Please note that YETI Custom Shop is unable to customize pre-purchased Rambler products. You must order customized product directly from YETI Custom Shop.
{!User.CommunityNickname} Account Management Team YETI 512.394.0222 sales@yeti.com yeti.com
